projects.title: Neuropulse: AI-Based Screen Addiction & Dopamine Spike Detector
projects.desc: Developing an AI-powered system to monitor smartphone usage patterns, detect addictive behavior, and infer dopamine spikes in real time.
projects.notes: Currently in dataset creation and model training stage.

projects.title: Flash Card Generator
projects.desc: A responsive web app to create and manage digital flashcards for studying. Supports text and image cards, improving usability for learners.
projects.notes: Version control with GitHub for collaboration.

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
projects.desc: A content-based movie recommendation engine using TF-IDF and cosine similarity to suggest top N similar movies based on user input.

projects.title: Restaurant Management System
projects.desc: A web-based system to handle reservations, orders, and billing. Focused on user-friendly design and smooth navigation.

projects.title: Online Registration of Dairy Farmers
projects.desc: A digital platform for dairy farmers to register and maintain production data, reducing manual paperwork.
